response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product stands out not just for its functionality but also for its unique features that cater to a wide range of needs. Given its high standards and the effort put into it, I believe it's worth more than its face value. To ensure both parties benefit, I am offering this exclusive opportunity to you for $150. I understand that every buyer has their own valuation, so if this price aligns with your expectations, please let me know. If not, I have another interested buyer, John, who is willing to purchase it for $100.", "product_price": 150}
